title: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view
description:
Description: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Try to select any item in the outline view.

Observed Behavior (OB): When attempting to select an item for the first time in the library outline view, the focus jumps to the library file node in the outline view.

Expected Behavior (EB): The item should be selected when clicked on for the first time.

Steps to Reproduce (SR):
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Click on any item in the outline view. It should be selected.
